sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Leaf, Recycle, Users, Globe, ArrowRight, CheckCircle, Award, Heart } from 'lucide-react'; import { sustainabilityInitiatives } from '../data/mockData'; import './Sustainability.css'; const Sustainability = () => { const impactStats = [ { number: '85%', label: 'Reduction in Water Usage', icon: }, { number: '100%', label: 'Organic Cotton Used', icon: }, { number: '50K+', label: 'Trees Planted', icon: }, { number: '0', label: 'Plastic Waste', icon: } ]; const materials = [ { name: 'Organic Cotton', percentage: 60, description: 'Grown without harmful pesticides, using 91% less water than conventional cotton.', benefits: ['Reduced water usage', 'No harmful chemicals', 'Better for farmers', 'Biodegradable'] }, { name: 'Recycled Polyester', percentage: 25, description: 'Made from recycled plastic bottles, reducing waste and energy consumption.', benefits: ['Reduces plastic waste', 'Lower energy consumption', 'Durable and long-lasting', 'Easy to care for'] }, { name: 'Hemp', percentage: 10, description: 'One of the most sustainable fibers, requiring minimal water and no pesticides.', benefits: ['Minimal water usage', 'No pesticides needed', 'Carbon negative', 'Naturally antimicrobial'] }, { name: 'Tencel', percentage: 5, description: 'Made from sustainably sourced wood pulp using a closed-loop process.', benefits: ['Closed-loop process', 'Biodegradable', 'Soft and comfortable', 'Wrinkle-resistant'] } ]; const certifications = [ { name: 'GOTS Certified', description: 'Global Organic Textile Standard ensures organic status of textiles.', icon: }, { name: 'Fair Trade', description: 'Ensures fair wages and safe working conditions for all workers.', icon: }, { name: 'Carbon Neutral', description: 'We offset all our carbon emissions through verified programs.', icon: }, { name: 'B-Corp Certified', description: 'Certified B Corporation meeting high standards of social and environmental performance.', icon: } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Sustainability at Our Core

We believe fashion should be a force for good. Every decision we make considers the impact on our planet and future generations.

{/* Impact Stats */}
{impactStats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}

{stat.number}

{stat.label}

))}
{/* Our Initiatives */}

Our Sustainability Initiatives

How we're making a positive impact on the environment

{sustainabilityInitiatives.map(initiative => (
{initiative.icon}

{initiative.title}

{initiative.description}

))}
{/* Materials */}

Sustainable Materials

Every fiber we use is carefully chosen for its environmental impact

{materials.map((material, index) => (

{material.name}

{material.percentage}%

{material.description}

Benefits:

    {material.benefits.map((benefit, i) => (
  • {benefit}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Certifications */}

Our Certifications

Third-party verified standards that ensure our commitment to sustainability

{certifications.map((cert, index) => (
{cert.icon}

{cert.name}

{cert.description}

))}
{/* Supply Chain */}

Transparent Supply Chain

We believe in complete transparency about where our clothes come from. Every step of our supply chain is carefully monitored to ensure ethical practices and environmental responsibility.

1

Material Sourcing

We source materials from certified organic and sustainable farms.

2

Manufacturing

Our manufacturing partners follow strict environmental and labor standards.

3

Packaging

All packaging is made from recycled and biodegradable materials.

4

Delivery

We use carbon-neutral shipping methods for all deliveries.

{/* Future Goals */}

Our Future Goals

Our commitment to continuous improvement in sustainability

2024 Goals

  • 100% renewable energy in all facilities
  • Zero waste to landfill
  • 50% reduction in packaging materials
  • Launch take-back program for old clothes

2025 Goals

  • Carbon negative operations
  • 100% circular design principles
  • Partner with 100% sustainable suppliers
  • Launch repair and upcycling services

2030 Vision

  • Net positive environmental impact
  • Regenerative agriculture partnerships
  • Industry-leading sustainability standards
  • Global community of conscious consumers
{/* CTA Section */}

Join Our Mission

Every purchase you make supports our mission to create a more sustainable fashion industry. Together, we can make a difference.

Shop Sustainable Men's Shop Sustainable Women's
); }; export default Sustainability;
